control_attributes.Control: SA-15 (8) REUSE OF THREAT / VULNERABILITY INFORMATION
control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to use threat modeling and vulnerability analyses from similar systems, components, or services to inform the current development process.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to:

Control Statement: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to use threat modeling and vulnerability analyses from similar systems, components, or services to inform the current development process.
Control Name: SA-15 (8) REUSE OF THREAT / VULNERABILITY INFORMATION
